SELECT b.id, b.title, b.replyCount, b.regdate FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.id, a.title, a.replyCount, a.regdate FROM (SELECT board_table.id, board_table.title, count(board_reply_table.id) AS replyCount, board_table.regdate FROM board_table LEFT JOIN board_reply_table ON board_table.id = board_reply_table.article_id GROUP BY board_table.id, board_table.title, board_table.regdate ORDER BY board_table.regdate )a WHERE rownum <= #{endCount} )b WHERE b.rnum >= #{startCount}
